snippet: Two paroled sex offenders are accused of raping and killing at least four women in Orange County while dutifully checking in with the police and wearing their GPS trackers.
lead_paragraph: Two paroled sex offenders are accused of raping and killing at least four women in Orange County while dutifully checking in with the police and wearing their GPS trackers.

headline.main: California: Two Accused of Murders and Rapes While Wearing GPS Trackers
headline.print_headline: California: Two Accused of Murders While Wearing Gps Trackers
